```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
here::here()
clean_data <- read_csv(here("clean_data/clean_data.csv"))
```

# longest long jump

```{r}
longest_long_jump <- clean_data %>%
  select(names, long_jump, competition) %>%
  arrange(desc(long_jump)) %>%
  head(1)
longest_long_jump

```


# Average 100m time in each competition

```{r}
average_100m <- clean_data %>%
  group_by(competition) %>%
  summarise(average_100m = mean(x100m))
  
average_100m
```

# who had the highest total points across both competitions

```{r}
olympicg_points <- clean_data %>%
  select(names, points, competition) %>%
  filter(competition == "OlympicG") 

decastar_points <- clean_data %>%
  select(names, points, competition) %>%
   filter(competition == "Decastar")

```

```{r}
clean_data %>%
  select(names, points) %>%
  group_by(names) %>%
  summarise(total_points = sum(points)) %>%
  arrange(desc(total_points)) %>%
  head(1)
  
```
